query:
SELECT DISTINCT t.id, t.full_name
        FROM teacher t
                 JOIN import i ON t.import_id = i.id
                 JOIN lesson l ON t.id = l.teacher_id
        WHERE l.day = EXTRACT(DOW FROM COALESCE($1, CURRENT_DATE)::date)
          AND i.user_id = $2
        ORDER BY t.full_name
